00369 SDL_Surface * game_engine::get_surface(unsigned int img_num)
00370 {
00371     if ( ((unsigned int) resources::surface_id.size()-1) >= img_num and ((unsigned int) resources::surface.size()-1) >= img_num)
00372     {
00373         return resources::surface.at(img_num);
00374     }
00375     else
00376         return NULL ;//SDL_CreateRGBSurface(SDL_HWSURFACE, 32, 32, 32, 0, 0, 0, 0xFFFFFFFF); //32x32, 32 bit black square
00377 }

00379 SDL_Surface * game_engine::get_surface(std::string id)
00380 {

00384         {
00385

00390

00492 bool game_engine::update()
00493 {
00494     if (!state==RUNNING)
00495         return 0;
00496 
00497     if (event()==0)
00498         return 0;
00499 
00500     SDL_FillRect(screen, 0, SDL_MapRGB(screen->format, 0, 0, 0));
00501 
00502     std::vector<controller *> new_control2;
00503 
00504     for (unsigned int i=0; i <= resources::control.size()-1; i++)
00505     {
00506         if (resources::control.at(i)==NULL)
00507             continue;
00508         //new error(INFO_HIGH,"Control"+convert_int_string(i));
00509         //std::cout << resources::control.at(i) <<"\n";
00510         resources::control.at(i)->update();//this);
00511 
00512         if (resources::control.at(i)->delete_this)
00513         {
00514             resources::control.at(i)->~controller();
00515             resources::control.at(i)=NULL;
00516         }
00517 
00518         new_control2.push_back(resources::control.at(i));
00519     }
00520 
00521     resources::control.swap(new_control2);
00522 
00523     //for (unsigned int i=0; i < resources::view.size(); i++)
00524     //{
00525         //view.at(i)->draw();
00526     // }
00527 
00528     std::vector<controller *> new_control;
00529 
00530     if (game::reset)
00531     {
00532         std::cout << resources::control.size() << " ";
00533         for (unsigned int ii=0; ii <= resources::control.size()-1; ii++)
00534         {
00535             if (resources::control.at(ii)==NULL)
00536                 continue;
00537             resources::control.at(ii)->reset();
00538 
00539             std::cout << ii << " " << resources::control.at(ii)->id_type << " " <<  resources::control.at(ii)->delete_this;
00540 
00545             if (resources::control.at(ii)->delete_this)
00546             {
00547                 std::cout << " deleted\n";
00548                 resources::control.at(ii)->~controller();
00549             }
00550             else
00551             {
00552                 new_control.push_back(resources::control.at(ii));
00553             }
00554         }
00555 
00556         resources::control.swap(new_control);
00557 
00558         game::reset=false;
00559         for (int i=0;i < 10;i++)
00560             resources::control.push_back(new astroid(this));
00561     }
00562 
00563     SDL_Flip(screen);
00564     return 1;
00565 }

00588 SDL_Surface * game_engine::render_text(std::string font, std::string texts, int fgR , int fgG , int fgB , int fgA ,int bgR , int bgG , int bgB , int bgA , textquality quality)
00589 {
00590     TTF_Font * fonttodraw=get_font(font);
00591 
00592     if (fonttodraw==NULL)
00593         return SDL_CreateRGBSurface(0x00000000,1,1,32,0,0,0,0); //depth argument must be fixed to change with diffrenent screen bit depths
00594 
00595     char * text = new char [texts.size()+1];
00596     strcpy (text, texts.c_str());
00597 
00598     SDL_Color tmpfontcolor = {fgR,fgG,fgB,fgA};
00599     SDL_Color tmpfontbgcolor = {bgR, bgG, bgB, bgA};
00600     SDL_Surface *resulting_text;
00601 
00602     if (quality == solid) resulting_text = TTF_RenderText_Solid(fonttodraw, text, tmpfontcolor);
00603     else if (quality == shaded) resulting_text = TTF_RenderText_Shaded(fonttodraw, text, tmpfontcolor, tmpfontbgcolor);
00604     else if (quality == blended) resulting_text = TTF_RenderText_Blended(fonttodraw, text, tmpfontcolor);
00605 
00606     return resulting_text;
00607 }

00609 void game_engine::blit( float x, float y, SDL_Surface* source, bool free, bool no_move)
00610 {
00611     SDL_Rect rect;
00612     if (no_move)
00613     {
00614         rect.x=round(x);
00615         rect.y=round(y);
00616     }
00617     else
00618     {
00619         rect.x=round(x)-view::x;
00620         rect.y=round(y)-view::y;
00621     }
00622 
00623     SDL_BlitSurface(source, 0, screen, &rect);
00624 
00625     if (free)
00626         SDL_FreeSurface(source);
00627 }

00629 
00630 bool game_engine::event()
00631 {
00632     while (SDL_PollEvent(engine_event))
00633     {
00634         switch (engine_event->type)
00635         {
00636         case SDL_QUIT:
00637         {
00638             return 0;
00639             break;
00640         }
00641 
00642         case SDL_KEYDOWN:
00643         {
00644             if (engine_event->key.keysym.sym == SDLK_ESCAPE)
00645             {
00646                 return 0;
00647                 break;
00648             }
00649 
00650             if (engine_event->key.keysym.sym == SDLK_q)
00651             {
00652                 return 0;
00653                 break;
00654             }
00655 
00656 
00657             if (engine_event->key.keysym.sym == SDLK_PRINT)
00658             {
00659                 /*time_t rawtime;
00660                 time ( &rawtime );
00661                 string stimes="./data/screenshots/screen"+convertintstr(rawtime)+" "+convertintstr(drip_random(0,99999))+".bmp";
00662                 SDL_SaveBMP(screen, stimes.c_str());
00663                 cout << "Screenshot: " << stimes << " added\n";*/
00664             }
00665 
00666             if (engine_event->key.keysym.sym == SDLK_PAUSE)
00667             {
00668                 break;
00669             }
00670 
00671         }
00672         }
00673     }
00674 
00675     return 1;
00676 }
00677 
00678 game_engine::~game_engine()
00679 {
00680     Mix_CloseAudio();
00681     TTF_Quit();
00682     SDL_Quit();
00683 }
